name.description: The name of the replacer, this will appear in the BoneMenu

color.description: The color of the button in BoneMenu that allows for managing the replacer

id.description: The ID of the replacer, this must be a unique one, two configs with the same ID cannot be registered at the same time

enabled.description: Whether or not the replacer is active, if true it will replace items with the replacements from the categories

categories.description: The categories that hold the actual replacements

name.description: The name of the category which will be shown in the BoneMenu

enabled.description: If true, the mod will check for the replacement and replace if found, otherwise the category will be ignored

original.description: The original barcode, here you can also use RegEx, but you have to set the 'isRegEx' property to true

replaceWith.description: The replacement for the original spawnable

isRegEx.description: If true, the 'original' property will be treated like RegEx, otherwise it will check if the original is simply equal to the item being spawned
